summary.para: Header: Declared in Msctf.idl and Msctf.h.
Library: Included as a resource in Msctf.dll.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: This interface is implemented by the TSF manager and used by a text service or application to set the display description of the language profile. To obtain an instance of this interface, call ITfInputProcessorProfiles.QueryInterface with IID_ITfInputProcessorProfilesEx.
